title: Naan Pesa Ninaipathellaam Lyrics Paalum Pazhamum
stanzas:
naan pesa ninaipathellaam
nee pesa vendum
naalodum pozhudhodum
uravaada vendum
uravaada vendum

naam kaanum ulagangal
nee kaana vendum
nee kaana vendum

nee kaanum porul yaavum
naan aaga vendum
naan aaga vendum

paavai un mugam paarthu
pasiyaara vendum
pasiyaara vendum

madi meedhu vilaiyaadum
sei aaga vendum
nee aaga vendum

sollrendrum mozhi endrum
porul endrum illai
porul endrum illai

sollaatha sollukku
vilai yedhum illai
vilai yedhum illai

ondrodu ondraaga
uyir serndha pinne
uyir serndha pinne

naan pesa ninaipathellaam
nee pesa vendum
naalodum pozhudhodum
uravaada vendum
uravaada vendum
